remarks: Adjoint of composition of projections.  Special case of Theorem 3.11(viii) of [Beran] p. 106.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Oct-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjco.1 $e |- G e. CH $.
pjco.2 $e |- H e. CH $.
pjadjcoi $p |- ( ( A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H ) -> ( ( ( ( projh ` G ) o. ( projh ` H ) ) ` A ) .ih B ) = ( A .ih ( ( ( projh ` H ) o. ( projh ` G ) ) ` B ) ) ) $.
